content: **sometimes your drink can be a little to hot for holding the mug this coffee mug cozy pattern will add a cute protective layer around the mug to protect your hands against the heat from a really hot drink ** > **use code get1off to receive $1 off a pattern purchase ** **size ** one size for a standard mug **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet **yarn ** 35 yards of #4 worsted weight we crochet dishie or lion brand 24/7 cotton or suitable substitute **tools ** us size g/6 4 0 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch marker **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
